price: 当时，你在早晨从家里出去，把信士们布置在阵地上。安拉是全聪的，是全知的。
arabic: وَإِذۡ غَدَوۡتَ مِنۡ أَهۡلِكَ تُبَوِّئُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ مَقَٰعِدَ لِلۡقِتَالِۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh ghadawta min ahlika tubawwi-u al-mu'minīna maqāʿida lil'qitāli wal-lahu samīʿun ʿalīmun
